content_descriptors.notes: Warning: Contains a lot of blood, gore, body parts and friendship.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4200M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that can go beep boop.
  • Additional Notes: This was the worst computer we could try it on, and it still ran. As long as you have Windows 10 it will probably run.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or whatever.
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForceGTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
